verbose_text: As initial stages of axon specification requires multiple negative and positive feed-back loops operating in a concerted manner, and ultimately assuring that one among the many neurites develops into an axon, we speculate that Nup358 would inhibit differentiation of other neurites into axons by negatively regulating the function of Dvl and aPKC (XREF_FIG).
evidence: Nup358 would inhibit differentiation of other neurites into axons by negatively regulating the function of Dvl
